snippet.title: Dustwind - The Last Resort | Console Gameplay Teaser | PS4, PS5, Xbox One, Xbox Series X|S
snippet.description:
Dustwind - The Last Resort, a tactical real-time game set in a dark, post-apocalyptic future, will hit consoles on September 15, 2021. The game found a group of dedicated fans in its PC release, and now PlayStation 4, PlayStation 5, Xbox One, and Xbox Series X|S owners will also be able to enjoy it.

Dustwind - The Last Resort tells the story of a nameless woman suffering from memory loss, beaten, and left to die in a world that has collapsed under the impact of the apocalypse. Despite everyone, the heroine did not die. She swore revenge on her tormentors and focused all her actions on this goal. But it soon turns out that not only her fate is at stake, but much, much more...

Pre-orders for Dustwind - The Last Resort for Xbox consoles on the Microsoft Store website: https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/p/dustwind--the-last-resort/9MTMJPQVQVFV

Get Dustwind on Steam - https://store.steampowered.com/app/600460/Dustwind/

🎮 Join us on discord and become part of the Dustwind community: https://discord.gg/DSvj7Zf
